About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

I am a Final Year Engineering student at the Sinhgad Academy of Engineering, Pune (SPPU) from where I'm pursuing my B.E in Computer Engineering. I have keen interest in the domain of Machine Learning and Artifical Intelligence. I'm also a Full Stack Web Developer. I enjoying coding and it has been a hobby of mine since years now. Having strong hold on Data Structures and Algorithms, I love solving problems on platforms like Codechef and Leetcode. Apart from all this, I like to listen to rap music, play football and read books in my free time.
